SELECT IDX, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_DESC, CONCAT( CONCAT( TO_CHAR(EVENT_START_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD'), ' ~ '), TO_CHAR(EVENT_END_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD')) as eventTerm, TARGET_NAME, THUMBNAIL_PATH, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as create_date FROM T_EVENT WHERE 1=1
AND EVENT_START_DATE <= sysdate
AND EVENT_END_DATE >= sysdate
AND EVENT_START_DATE < sysdate
AND EVENT_END_DATE < sysdate
AND EVENT_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND EVENT_DESC LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC OFFSET #{startNumber} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{listLimitNumber} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT (IDX) FROM T_EVENT WHERE 1=1
AND EVENT_START_DATE <= sysdate
AND EVENT_END_DATE >= sysdate
AND EVENT_START_DATE < sysdate
AND EVENT_END_DATE < sysdate
AND EVENT_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
